Hachimiya Ahamada (amụrụ n'afọ 1976) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri French nke si Comoros, nke a maara maka ihe nkiri ya gbasara ndị Comoros.

A mụrụ Hachimiya Ahamada na Dunkirk na 1976 nye nne na nna ndị Comoros. O mere ihe ngosi dị mkpirikpi dị ka onye nọ n'afọ iri na ụma na ụlọ ọrụ vidio Dunkirk, ma mesịa mụọ ntụziaka ihe nkiri na INSAS na Brussels
E sere ihe nkiri ya dị mkpirikpi The Ylang Ylang Residence (2008) na Comoros Islands, na n'asụsụ Comorian

E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ahụ n'ihe karịrị mmemme mba ịrị ato na ise, nke gụnyere International Critics Week na 2008 Cannes Film Festival. Ọ meriri ihe nrite na 2009 Quintessenve International Film Festival nke Ouidah, 2009 Francophone Festival nke Vaulx-en-Velin, na 2009 African, Asian na Latin American Film Festival nke Milan.
Ahamada na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri ihe nkiri, Maïssane ma ọ bụ Canticle of the Stars.
